                                                <img class="cover__img js-lazy" src="https://cdn.myportfolio.com/f62707d6-4d0f-455b-a3ce-f1455fae5432/905b3672-7024-4410-afa7-de143a3796e2_rwc_0x209x1920x1501x32.png?h=d3a338da9e45d44997659ce5bf274337" data-src="https://cdn.myportfolio.com/f62707d6-4d0f-455b-a3ce-f1455fae5432/905b3672-7024-4410-afa7-de143a3796e2_rwc_0x209x1920x1501x1920.png?h=4797cd4a2bca5dae31f79e62a0824cc4" data-srcset="https://cdn.myportfolio.com/f62707d6-4d0f-455b-a3ce-f1455fae5432/905b3672-7024-4410-afa7-de143a3796e2_rwc_0x209x1920x1501x640.png?h=e2cf4931673be5ee33ac1ef3d705b8bd 640w, https://cdn.myportfolio.com/f62707d6-4d0f-455b-a3ce-f1455fae5432/905b3672-7024-4410-afa7-de143a3796e2_rwc_0x209x1920x1501x1280.png?h=2506ce6e99c05c69e5dd91f0d3b6112d 1280w, https://cdn.myportfolio.com/f62707d6-4d0f-455b-a3ce-f1455fae5432/905b3672-7024-4410-afa7-de143a3796e2_rwc_0x209x1920x1501x1366.png?h=69f53ba24a1f645b40dd0fa2eb2e09a3 1366w, https://cdn.myportfolio.com/f62707d6-4d0f-455b-a3ce-f1455fae5432/905b3672-7024-4410-afa7-de143a3796e2_rwc_0x209x1920x1501x1920.png?h=4797cd4a2bca5dae31f79e62a0824cc4 1920w, https://cdn.myportfolio.com/f62707d6-4d0f-455b-a3ce-f1455fae5432/905b3672-7024-4410-afa7-de143a3796e2_rwc_0x209x1920x1501x1920.png?h=4797cd4a2bca5dae31f79e62a0824cc4 2560w, https://cdn.myportfolio.com/f62707d6-4d0f-455b-a3ce-f1455fae5432/905b3672-7024-4410-afa7-de143a3796e2_rwc_0x209x1920x1501x1920.png?h=4797cd4a2bca5dae31f79e62a0824cc4 5120w" data-sizes="(max-width: 540px) 100vw, (max-width: 768px) 50vw, calc(1200px / 3)">
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="details-wrap">
                                        <div class="details">
                                            <div class="details-inner">
                                                <div class="title preserve-whitespace">Feminine Rage</div>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </a>
                        </section>
